title: Love Fruit Overview, Abilities, and More: Blox Fruits Guide

steps.title: The Love Fruit is a Legendary Natural-type Blox Fruit.
steps.content: The Love Fruit is a Legendary Natural-type Blox Fruit. You can buy it for $1,300,000 or 1,700 Robux from the Blox Fruit Dealer. [1] X Research source

steps.title: The Love Fruit is great at applying debuffs.
steps.content: The Love Fruit is great at applying debuffs. It also gives you a flight move, so it's great for aerial combat in Blox Fruits . Overall, the Love Fruit is a pretty good fruit to use, but more powerful fruits are available. Get the Love Fruit if you enjoy aerial combat or like its cute pink aesthetic.

steps.title: Heart Shot (Z)
steps.content: Heart Shot ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Damage: 3012 Description: Shoots a heart-shaped arrow where you click that explodes on contact or when it reaches its max range. Heart Shot will also apply the Lovestruck passive debuff. This debuff temporarily decreases damage done to you and distorts the enemy's screen, filling it with pink hearts.

steps.title: Cupid Zone (X)
steps.content: Cupid Zone ( X ) Mastery cost: 50 Mastery Damage: About 3833 Description:' Shoots an arrow into the air, creating a sparkling pink heart. Any enemy in the zone indicated by the sparkling heart will take tick damage.

steps.title: Irresistible Attraction (C)
steps.content: Irresistible Attraction ( C ) Mastery cost: 150 Mastery Damage: 3026-3649 Description: Creates a circle around the user that pulls nearby enemies closer to you, after which a shining heart explodes and causes damage. You can hold down C to create a larger circle and do more damage. Irresistible Attraction will also apply the Lovestruck passive debuff. This debuff temporarily decreases damage done to you and distorts the enemy's screen, filling it with pink hearts.

steps.title: Besto Friendo (V)
steps.content: Besto Friendo ( V ) Mastery cost: 200 Mastery Damage: 2464 Description: Shoots a heart-shaped arrow that, when it explodes, creates a friendly NPC that will fight alongside you. This NPC can jump, dash, attack, and swim, and their damage scales off of your level.

steps.title: Flamingo Ride (F)
steps.content: Flamingo Ride ( F ) Mastery cost: 100 Mastery Damage: n/a Description: Creates a flamingo for you to ride on. The flamingo can fly freely in every direction. You can use the fruit's moves while on the Flamingo, but not your weapons. However, if you are using a gamepad, you can use your fighting style, swords, and guns while using Flamingo Ride.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros A great fruit overall for boss hunting since it excels at aerial combat Easy to obtain Heart Shot does a good amount of damage and is on a short cooldown Cupid Zone has a very long range Irresistible Attraction is good for combos Besto Friendo is great for killing bosses and NPCs Flamingo Ride is good for skycamping

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Does lower damage than other fruits overall Heart Shot has high knockback, and it is hard to aim Cupid Zone is easy to dodge Irresistible Attraction requires you to get close to enemies Besto Friendo isn't very useful for aerial fights Flamingo Ride has a low flight speed, which can make escaping difficult Flamingo Ride also doesn't allow you to use non-fruit attacks (unless you're playing with a gamepad)
